entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
